name: Neuron EHR Tool Kit

screenshots.caption: Neuron EHR Tool Kit Patient Encounter

short_description:
After 4 years of development and production use, the clinical modules created by Roberts-Hoffman were bundled together and released to the healthcare community under the GPL free software license.  The objectives of the Neuron project are to demonstrate that open source software is viable for healthcare, to build better systems that are accessible to healthcare providers, and to contribute to the open source communities that make these types of projects possible.

The Neuron EHR Tool Kit is based on a solid web-based framework.  The platform independent architecture integrates well with existing systems.  A REST API enables developers to support and enhance the features of limited solutions and bring connectivity to disparate healthcare systems.

Take a look at the Neuron EHR Quick Tour video series on YouTube here: http://goo.gl/T4V55X
summary: Web based EHR and tools using a smart longitudinal patient record.
